short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The xFarm.Land browser extension enables browsing and interact with Twitter and building your virtual digital farm.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to xFarm.Land, where your Twitter timeline will be transformed into a vibrant digital farm. In this captivating world of pixel art, you do more than just collect resources and manage a farm; you also interact with friends on Twitter, helping each other and improving your skills together. Every action you take weaves into a collective narrative, secured by the immutable guarantee of blockchain technology.
